original: intros T F FilterF f g h Hdomin. unfold is_domin in *. intros eps. specialize (Hdomin eps) as Hfg. apply filter_imp with (P := fun x : T => norm (g x) <= eps * norm (f x)) (Q := fun x : T => norm (g x * h x) <= eps * norm (f x * h x)). - intros x H. unfold norm in *. apply Rmult_le_compat_r. + apply norm_pos. + apply H. - auto.
